title: Study Says Red wine can cure anxiety and depression
content: Red wine is often associated with sophistication. Picture someone holding a glass of red wine, and you are likely to picture a well groomed person who is dressed immaculately. You can blame movies and TV shows for this link, but the Roman are actually the reason for the classy image of red wine.
